meanings.definition: A unit of measurement for the performance of a computer processor.
meanings.sent1: The new computer processor was rated at 500 mips.
meanings.sent2: The technician tested the mips of the processor to ensure its speed.
meanings.sent3: The computer processor boasted about its high mips to the other components.
meanings.sent4: In the world of technology, mips are the heartbeat of a computer.
meanings.sent5: The mips of the processor determined its efficiency in processing data.

meanings.definition: A type of bird known for its distinctive call.
meanings.sent1: The mips perched on the branch and sang a melodious tune.
meanings.sent2: Birdwatchers gathered to catch a glimpse of the rare mips in the forest.
meanings.sent3: The mips chirped loudly, trying to outdo the other birds in the area.
meanings.sent4: The mips' call echoed through the forest, signaling the start of a new day.
meanings.sent5: Children listened in awe to the beautiful song of the mips.

meanings.definition: A slang term for million instructions per second.
meanings.sent1: The computer could process data at a speed of 2 mips.
meanings.sent2: Programmers aimed to optimize their code to increase the mips of the system.
meanings.sent3: The old computer struggled to keep up with the high mips demanded by the software.
meanings.sent4: In the tech world, achieving high mips is a sign of efficient programming.
meanings.sent5: The mips of the new software set a record for speed in processing instructions.
